content: sometimes the best sock is the humble down-to -earth socks whether you re looking to showcase a special yarn that doesn t need any fancy stitch patterns or looking for a relaxing tv project this pattern is for you these socks are worked from the cuff down and include three sizes for fingering-weight yarns as well they are written specifically for magic-loop knitting and include a heel flap and gusset but feel free to substitute your own needle preference and preferred heel and toe methods sizes included are women s s m l finished foot circumference 7 8 9 in/ 18 20 23 cm the pattern is easily adaptable to to larger sizes
